name: Fawaterak
description: Developer of an online invoicing platform intended to help freelancers and micro and small businesses with online payments. The company's platform offers its users to add their customers, create and deliver tailored invoices, and simplifies the payment process for both parties, enabling clients to start their business online and collect payments through different payment methods.
one_liner: Developer of an online invoicing platform intended to help freelancers and micro and small businesses with online payments. The company's platform offers its users to add their customers, create and deliver tailored invoices, and simplifies the payment process for both parties, enabling clients to start their business online and collect payments through different payment methods.
